Gerçekten başyapıt bir oyun. Çıktığı zamanın çok ötesinde bir yapım olmuş. Neredeyse eksik yönü yok oyunun. Oynanış, grafikler, fizikler, sesler, bölüm tasarımları ve en önemlisi de hikaye muazzam. 

''Oyun nedir?'' sorusunun en iyi cevabı bu oyundur.

I just don't get it. Throws out all of the fun and interesting stuff from the first game to do its own essentially unrelated story with bad pacing, mediocre gameplay, and 0 chance to get emotionally atached to the 1 dimensional "characters" in the story. This game is fine at best and the core mechanics are fairly solid, but there's nothing here that Half-Life or many other FPS games don't do better.

Игра по моему мнению Играем за Гошу пиздячим до челябинска из воронежа ебашим всех и увольняем бена и идем атокавать укайну и вос

Бесспорный шедевр своего времени , который задал высокую планку качества всем играм эпохи - создав настоящий стандарт и эталон качества. Сквозь года детище Валв ни устарело ни на грамм. Проработанная и уникальная физика в игре , интереснейший сюжет - чье продолжение мы , верные фанаты ждали и будем ждать , легендарнейший саундтрек , потрясающая атмосфера созданная в игре - все эти громкие и прекрасные слова о Half Life 2 , игре , на которую ровнялись и будут ровняться разработчики игр. Не стоит и забывать об уникальном движке игры - Sourse , который не смотря на свой возраст равный игре Half Life продолжает служить базисом большому количеству новых игр и модификаций. Half Life 2 навсегда в наших фанатских сердцах. И мы дождемся третьей части. Обязательно...

Increíble como un juego así de viejo, se sigue jugando mucho mejor y viendo mejor que muchos juegos actuales. La historia parece bastante simple pero una vez adentrándonos dentro de ella, veremos que las cosas no son tan fáciles ni simples como parecen. Las expresiones faciales de los personajes no han envejecido nada mal (Hasta parece que Valve siguio actualizando el juego para no envejecer tan rapido). El juego construye una atmosfera en la que te puedes sentir tan inmerso en el mundo del juego, pocos juegos han podido hacer lo que ha hecho Valve con HF2 (Probablemente los unicos que hayan llegado a acercarse sean Dice con BF1 y Rockstar con Red dead redemption 2)

I heard things about this game that were bad I asked my friends why it was so bad. They responded with few words and those words were it was made in 2004 and as an uncultured swine I believe them them weeks after i saw a review by The Act Man he was the same guy who introduced me to RE4, Titanfall 2, and Half-Life 1 I saw a deal going on for the Half-Life game bundle and decided lets give it a try I downloaded and played half-life 1 and that was the first game I ever go over 60 fps on my SH*TY LAPTOP I PLAYED IT GOT Bored of the game but it was awesome as hell so when i saw hl2 was in my library I left my crappy laptop and my crappy internet on for 5 days straight only to reveal the game downloaded I opened it up and to my surprise my fps was above 17 frames on any other game than people playground i beat the 2nd hl after 17.5 hours and watched a guy do a retrospect on all the hl games and when I finally finished i saw something called Hl2 episode one and just beat it the day of this review and can I say Gabe Newel I want to shake your hand yet slap it away because you and Valve Corp. Made awesome games just thats it you made great games after beating the second i was happy i looked up HL3 on steam No results so I google when is HL3 coming out and google said never I dont want to do a in depth review but if you havent play HL2 please also scew zombines as Alnx calls them and also screw fast zombies not that i hate them from development wise but from a 8 deaths from zombine grenade kind of screw you. Anyways buy the game don't even try to download "Free copies" of the game as much as valve became a money grubbing cooperation they deserve the 10-15 dollars the game costs now. PS: buy Garry's mod its so fun to mod it and mess around in it but dont even try to play HL2 through gmod.

DO NOT BUY THIS GAME. IT IS ONE OF THE WORST EXPERIENCES EVER JUST BECAUSE OF A SIMPLE SOUND CHANGE! I FUCKING HATE YOU VALVE! [b]Первая игра которая зацепила на столько, что сидел несколько дней. В игре есть все и шутер, и головоломки (вентиль в подвалах), жесткий хоррор. Постоянная нехватка патронов. Очень глубокое погружение в игру, которого в современных играх особо не встретишь. Игра которая стала культовой в свое время, и продолжения которой ждут миллионы.[/b]
[hr][/hr]
[h1]Моя оценка: 10 гравипушек из 10[/h1]

Admittedly never played this gem back in the days of owning the Orange Box, due to being busy with my friends with things like Minecraft or Team Fortress 2, but after finally giving it a go? Definitely one Hell of a gem, even almost 2 decades after it came out.

Whether you buy it straight away or wait for a sale to pick this up and the other Valve titles, go ahead and do it, you won't be disappointed.

And now trick question time: What is the best part about Half-Life, and why is it Lamarr?
